name: StarDunk
summary:
Bastketball in Space with thousands of players from Earth. Isn't that awesome?
Stardunk is a Massively Multiplayer Online Basketball where you play against all the players from the planet Earth in realtime. More than 5 millions have downloaded and are enjoying Stardunk, come and join us for super fun parties of more than a thousands of players.
